menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: Our delicious salad is served with Feta cheese and peeled cucumber. Includes tomatoes, onions, olives, salt and oregano in the ingredients.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Delicious grilled bread rubbed with garlic and topped with olive oil and salt. Our Bruschetta includes tomato and cheese.

menu.name: Grilled Fish
menu.description: Fantastic grilled fish seasoned with salt.

menu.name: Lemon Dessert
menu.description: You can't go wrong with this delicious lemon dessert!

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: An Italian dessert consisting of layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and a rich creamy mixture.

menu.name: Chicken Tagine
menu.description: Traditional Moroccan chicken tagine cooked with preserved lemon, olives, onions, and aromatic spices.

menu.name: Beef Tagine with Prunes
menu.description: Slow-cooked beef tagine served with sweet prunes, almonds, and a blend of Moroccan spices.

menu.name: Couscous with Seven Vegetables
menu.description: Classic Moroccan couscous served with steamed semolina, chickpeas, and seven seasonal vegetables.

menu.name: Harira Soup
menu.description: Traditional Moroccan soup made with tomatoes, lentils, chickpeas, herbs, and spices.

menu.name: Zaalouk
menu.description: Smoky eggplant and tomato salad seasoned with garlic, olive oil, and Moroccan spices.

menu.name: Briouats
menu.description: Crispy Moroccan pastries filled with spiced minced meat and herbs.

menu.name: Moroccan Mint Tea
menu.description: Traditional green tea infused with fresh mint and sugar.

menu.name: Fresh Orange Juice
menu.description: Freshly squeezed Moroccan oranges, served chilled.

menu.name: Chebakia
menu.description: Traditional Moroccan sesame cookie fried and coated with honey.

menu.name: Sellou
menu.description: Traditional Moroccan sweet made from roasted flour, almonds, sesame seeds, and honey.
